items.title:
Circle of  O R I G I N A L  C O N T E N T Creators

As an ORIGINAL CONTENT creator, we thank you for...

object.content:
Circle of  O R I G I N A L  C O N T E N T Creators

As an ORIGINAL CONTENT creator, we thank you for creating art and sharing it with the rest of us.

Those included in this circle are active creators of original content who also re-share this circle and encourage others to post creative personal work.

[If you missed it,  also check the MOJITO FRIDAY CIRCLE via the link below, all original content creators qualify for that circle. All you have to do is ask for inclusion] 

PLEASE ADD & RE-SHARE
Click on the link that says "Add Circle" to make your Google+ go at Warp Speed. Then, click  on the little right pointing arrow to "Share."

This Circle is shared every Monday. Those included are our choice. They are NOT automatically added.

To be considered:
1- Add the theme page to your circles
2- Ask to be included in the Original post
3- Re-share this circle in your stream
4- You must be a maker of ORIGINAL work
5- We will check your stream before adding you

Current Circles:

Published Mondays
ORIGINAL CONTENT: http://goo.gl/Lq64c8

Published Wednesdays
WANT TO BE CIRCLED:  http://goo.gl/6Sx9DV

Published Fridays
MOJITO FRIDAY http://goo.gl/2WQ5PO

Published Sundays
AWESOME PAGES TO FOLLOW:  http://goo.gl/Wyuzze

#originalcontentcreators  ﻿

items.title: Lost one of two of my 3TB drives. It did not initialize after OS update, and me being smart applied ...

object.content:
Lost one of two of my 3TB drives. It did not initialize after OS update, and me being smart applied MBR record to, apparently GPT drive. Further Voodoo dances did not help. Now my only copy of image archive is being replicated in a galaxy far far away at home surrounded by breaking artists and technology prevention shamans...
Amazon did not pay me for the link Glacier is the off-site backup solution for me to use -- most sacred data will be stored there from now on.

#magentariver   #жж  ﻿

attachments.content: Amazon Glacier provides a low cost, fully redundant data archiving storage infrastructure for storing any amount of data for periods ranging from months to decades.

items.title:
Interesting development from Google:
Now you can embed public Google+ posts in your site or articles...

object.content:
Interesting development from Google:
Now you can embed public Google+ posts in your site or articles with just a few lines of HTML code. Your signed-in Google+ readers can +1 or comment on your post directly from your site or follow the author.

[Crosspost tags: #magentariver   #жж ]﻿

items.title:
Part 2 of my G+ to Facebook automated cross-posting guide.
This is a full-featured solution that works...

object.content:
Part 2 of my G+ to Facebook automated cross-posting guide. 
This is a full-featured solution that works as simple as:
1. Create a post in #googleplus  
2. Enjoy it being automatically delivered to your #facebook  account 

#жж   #magentariver  ﻿

attachments.content:
The previous post on this topic  Google+ to Facebook, automated image posting via RSS  focused mostly on automating cross-posting of single images from Google+ stream to Facebook and Flickr. The feedback I have received have highlighted that this method is not efficient when cross-posting links or plain text updates to Facebook.

 So now, after a few hours of fiddling with  Yahoo Pipes  and  IFTTT , I am proud to present a new and improved method...

items.title: Did you ever posted an image to multiple social pages? Remember the frustration of uploading the same...

object.content:
Did you ever posted an image to multiple social pages? Remember the frustration of uploading the same file multiple times? Unless you like customizing images and annotations for each social destination, please read on my post on magentariver.com on how to automate posting to multiple social networks.

#magentariver   #rssfeed   #googleplus   #crosspost  ﻿

attachments.displayName: Google+ to Facebook, automated image posting via RSS
attachments.content:
The Problem  Did you ever posted an image to multiple social pages? Remember the frustration of uploading the same file multiple times? Unless  you like customizing images and annotations for each social destination, please read on   -- I may bring an end to all (or at least some) of your pains. 

              Attention attraction image depicts an actual Yahoo Pipe that generates G+ RSS feed used in this solution

           The Solution  The ba...

items.title: The #sydneyharbourbridge  again! And I must admit that this time it was a sort of cheating from my side...

object.content:
The #sydneyharbourbridge  again! And I must admit that this time it was a sort of cheating from my side -- I went to a complete tourist attraction and took a shot from a totally predictable point. One good thing about this shot is that I can always go and get a better quality version. 
BTW, cheers to a guy with Горизонт panoramic camera, circa 1970s who had to wait for me to take a snap.

For #MonochromeMonday (+Monochrome Monday) Curated by +Hans Berendsen , +Jerry Johnson , +Steve Barge, +Dominique Hilbert , +David Orr and +Martin Heller 

#bw   #sydney   #australia   #magentariver  ﻿
